definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: dismay, sudden terror or ruin (cf. As. bêltu, terror, Dl:Pr 32)—´[[בּ]] abs. Le 26:16 + 2 t.; pl. [[וּבֶֽהָלוֹת]] Je 15:8; —sudden terror Le 26:16 ´[[וְהִפְקַדְתִּ֫י עֲלֵיכֶם בּ]] (appositives follow); cf. Je 15:8; Is 65:23 [[לאׁ יֵֽלְדוּ לַבֶּהָלָה]], Ps 78:33 [[וַיְכַל־בַּהֶבֶל]] [[יְמֵיהֶָם וּשְׁנוֹתָם בַּבֶּהָלֶה]] and he ended their days in a breath, and their years in sudden terror.
